pkgmetadata.longdescription: Decode Information from Neural Activity // Neural decoding is method of analyzing neural data that uses a pattern classifiers to predict experimental conditions based on neural activity. 'NeuroDecodeR' is a system of objects that makes it easy to run neural decoding analyses. For more information on neural decoding see Meyers Kreiman (2004) doi:10.7551/mitpress/8404.003.0024.
